titleStmt.title: Good nevves and bad nevves. By S.R.
titleStmt.author: Rowlands, Samuel, 1570?-1630?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by George Purslowe] for Henry Bell, and are to be sold at his shop within the Hospitall gate in Smith-field,
